channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sam Altman says there has been a ‘vibe shift’ in Silicon Valley’s relationship with Washington under Donald Trump
item.description: Sam Altman, along with several other major tech leaders, has embraced the new administration and its tech-friendly policies.

item.title: Super Micro’s stock slides as server maker cuts its sales outlook
Top U.S. Amazon sellers are furious about the ‘avalanche’ of Chinese competitors—and they crave a Trump intervention
item.description: The billionaire investor Mark Cuban also told Fortune that the state of competition on Amazon is “a huge problem for small companies."

item.title: Forget CPI: This market indicator says inflation may stay above 2% for years.
Here's a cheat sheet on how the S&P 500 may react to core CPI data
Baidu CEO defends heavy AI investments as competition heats up and Apple reportedly looks elsewhere
item.description: "When technology still evolves at such a rapid rate, you just cannot stop investing," CEO Robin Li said in Dubai on Tuesday.

item.title: e.l.f. Beauty CEO on how to reach Gen-Z women
item.description: Also: Altman gets candid about Elon, Powell shrugs off possibility of Trump firing Fed members.

item.title: Musk appears alongside Trump in the White House to admit mistakes will happen in DOGE’s major government reform: ‘Nobody is going to bat 1,000’
item.description: Elon Musk admitted he won't be correct 100% of the time in his work at DOGE, after being questioned if his team had mistakenly said $50m in condoms we...

item.title: Will Trump’s aluminum tariffs raise prices on canned drinks? What to expect.
Thinking of not paying taxes? This is what it could cost you.
